verses.verse: Jesus, with Thy church abide; Be her Savior, Lord, and Guide, While on earth her faith is tried: We beseech Thee, hear us.
May her voice be ever clear, Warning of a judgment near, Telling of a Savior dear: We beseech Thee, hear us.
May she guide the poor and blind, Seek the lost until she find, And the broken hearted bind: We beseech Thee, hear us.
May she holy triumps win, Overthrow the hosts of sin, Gather all the nations in: We beseech Thee, hear us.
